ingredients.content: 1 tsp ground cayenne pepper, to taste (optional)

preparations.content: Place garlic, onions and oil in mixing bowl then chop <b>4 sec/speed 4<b>, then sauté <b>8 min/120°C/speed <b>.
Add white wine and cook <b>2 min/Varoma/speed <b>.
Add passata and tomato purée then cook <b>5 min/120°C/speed <b>.
Add squid, cayenne and salt then cook <b>20 min/100°C//speed <b>.
Replace measuring cup with simmering basket, then cook again <b>10 min/Varoma//speed <b>. Serve immediately.
